tool_description: Use this API to retrieve quotes filled with wisdom!
name: Wisdom API
title: Wisdom API

api_list.name: wisdomoftheday
api_list.description: Daily Wisdom Quote: This API endpoint provides a wise quote that is refreshed everyday between 8-9 AM PT.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-api3.p.rapidapi.com/wisdomoftheday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-api3.p.rapidapi.com/wisdomoftheday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
